Title: Rally the Survivors
Description:
The people of this village are simple farmers - not fighters like you and I. Still, they are stubbornly defending their homes as best they can.

Search the village for anyone still on their feet and tell them to rally here at Hanae's place.
ObjectivesText: Speak with 5 Nectarbreeze Farmers around Nectarbreeze Orchard and send them to the safehouse.
RewardText: They're inside. Shaken, but alive thanks to you.
